description.value: Whether imago or instar, dessamars have intrinsic magical abilities. Technology-infused runes carved into your hands (or similar appendages) allow you to cast @Compendium[sfrpg.spells.3nFCrisRp2GIjbR3]{Charm Person} once per day, as well as @Compendium[sfrpg.spells.kxx5x0JAgFuEQJAm]{Detect Magic} and @Compendium[sfrpg.spells.R6MvvYVPDf21fE8Y]{Telepathic Message} at will as spell-like abilities. The caster level for these effects is equal to your level.
